Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are gearing up for the Australian Federal Budget of 2023 creating recommendations and voicing out their concerns. Six key priorities from the Women's Economic Equality Taskforce highlight the need to support vulnerable groups and reduce rental stress. However several voices such as the Australia Institute call for the scrapping of fiscally irresponsible and costly Stage 3 tax cuts. Yet some seemingly mock the upcoming budget with comparisons to a "coronation fiasco" and the possibility of losing interest on the $1T government debt.
